predictions.text: At its September 9, 2025 event, Apple will announce at least one new iPhone model featuring on-device generative AI capabilities (e.g., text or image generation) that run locally without requiring cloud inference.
predictions.verification_criteria: Apple Newsroom press release or official product pages published 2025-09-09 to 2025-09-12 explicitly state on-device generative AI features for a new iPhone model; acceptable terms include 'on-device' or 'runs on device'.
evidence: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/apple-announces-iphone-launch-on-sept-9-.html
Recent industry trend toward local LLM features on mobile NPUs
Apple’s prior positioning of Apple Intelligence with on-device components
monitoring_signals: Apple event invite and agenda details
Leaked A18/A19 NPU TOPS and memory specs
Developer documentation updates referencing on-device AI
Carrier marketing materials mentioning AI capabilities
predictions.rationale: Apple guided to a Sept 9 launch and is incentivized to showcase tangible, privacy-preserving AI features leveraging upgraded NPUs.

predictions.text: U.S. Core CPI (CPI-U less food and energy) for August 2025 will be 0.2% to 0.3% m/m (seasonally adjusted).
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI news release on 2025-09-11 shows the SA Core CPI m/m in [0.2%, 0.3%].
evidence: https://www.bls.gov/schedule/news_release/cpi.htm
Shelter disinflation trend and softer core goods indicators
Commodity energy volatility excluded from core
predictions.rationale: Core goods softness and gradual shelter moderation point to a stable 0.2–0.3% monthly print.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-27 close to 2025-10-15 close, Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) will underperform Nvidia (NVDA) by at least 8.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted close data (e.g., Bloomberg, Yahoo Finance), compute AMD%return − NVDA%return from 2025-08-27 close to 2025-10-15 close; value must be ≤ −8.0 pp.
evidence: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/4-big-questions-for-nvidia-the-most-important-stock-in-the-market.html
NVDA ecosystem/software advantage and shipment cadence
Investor preference for scale and margins in data center AI
monitoring_signals: AI software stack adoption news (CUDA, Triton, ROCm)
predictions.rationale: Nvidia’s stronger software moat and supply positioning should sustain relative outperformance near term.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, AT&T will announce a definitive agreement to acquire EchoStar spectrum or related licenses in a transaction valued at $20 billion or more.
predictions.verification_criteria: An AT&T or EchoStar press release or SEC filing (e.g., 8-K) dated on/before 2025-10-15 states a signed definitive agreement with stated value ≥ $20B for spectrum/license assets.
evidence: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/echostar-stock-att-wireless-musk.html
Industry consolidation incentives for 5G spectrum
Market reaction indicating seriousness of negotiations
monitoring_signals: AT&T investor relations updates or 8-K filings
predictions.rationale: Public reporting and price action imply advanced negotiations; a definitive agreement is a logical next step.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-15, a U.S. federal court will issue a temporary restraining order or preliminary injunction preventing removal or suspension of Fed Governor Lisa Cook pending litigation.
predictions.verification_criteria: A federal court docketed order (PACER/CourtListener or court website) on/before 2025-09-15 enjoins the White House from removing or suspending Lisa Cook; the order must explicitly be a TRO or preliminary injunction.
evidence: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/trump-fed-cook-respond-court.html
https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/us-treasury-yields-trump-says-hes-firing-fed-governor-lisa-cook-.html
Legal precedent requiring cause for removal of independent board members
monitoring_signals: Emergency motions for TRO/PI on the docket
Statements from the Federal Reserve’s counsel
predictions.rationale: Courts often preserve the status quo in separation-of-powers disputes pending full adjudication.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the U.S. Department of Defense will publish a public RFI, memo, or Federal Register notice discussing potential government equity stakes or warrants in major U.S. defense contractors.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official DoD website posting or Federal Register notice dated on/before 2025-10-31 references consideration of equity stakes or warrants in defense primes (e.g., Lockheed, RTX, Northrop, GD, Boeing).
evidence: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/trump-pentagon-equity-stakes-in-defense-contractors.html
DoD precedent for alternative financing mechanisms in defense industrial base
predictions.rationale: Public float of the idea suggests a policy exploration phase likely to produce a formal document.

predictions.text: Freddie Mac PMMS 30-year fixed-rate mortgage average will print at or above 7.50% in at least one weekly release by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Freddie Mac’s PMMS weekly report dated on or before 2025-09-30 shows the national average 30-year fixed mortgage rate ≥ 7.50%.
evidence: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/26/us-treasury-yields-trump-says-hes-firing-fed-governor-lisa-cook-.html
Mortgage rates track 10Y UST and MBS spreads; recent volatility and term premia
Policy uncertainty around Fed governance
predictions.rationale: Increased term premia and policy risk can lift mortgage rates even if front-end yields ease.
